name: Second Slayer
description:
Second Slayer is a short platform game where you need to destroy all the targets before the time runs out.

Try to beat the game as fast as possible!

This is just a little demo, the full release will feature stuff like:

  • - +200 stages
  • - Level Editor (You can share)
  • - Multiple Platforms

For updates, follow @GBarroso_SL on twitter

Game developed as a postgraduate work in electronic games development at the Amazonas State University.
